body:
@jake-stripe is this something you could help with.
It would be great if dropbox users could have huge dir cache without manually refreshing every file/folder added to remote. I guess back then when dropbox was implemented API did not support polling, but now it does.
@ncw any chance you add this one to v1.47 milestone.
@ajkis I'm sorry but I'm pretty tied up with work right now. I won't be able work on this :/

> @ajkis I'm sorry but I'm pretty tied up with work right now. I won't be able work on this :/

Thanks for reply.

issue.title: Dropbox poll-interval support

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
Hi! I'm trying to make the usual streaming Plex media server on a VPS by mounting my Dropbox movie directory with `rclone`.

I noticed that `poll-interval` is not supported with Dropbox remotes, and so I'm currently mounting my cloud drive with `dir-cache-time` set to `1`. I don't know what the exact implications of doing that are performance-wise; I'd really appreciate it if we can discuss them here as I'm willing to work on a solution to this.

The relevant Dropbox API endpoint that matches this scenario would be:
https://www.dropbox.com/developers/documentation/http/documentation#files-list_folder-longpoll

What's your opinion on this matter?

body: @jake-stripe @ajkis yesterday I raised [this issue](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/4548) which is identical to this one. As I said in there, I can work on adding support for Dropbox's poll-interval, I'd just need a little guidance as to where to start looking at in the code and to know which files are relevant to this.

@ncw awesome, i'll try to kick this off sometime during this week, and I'll be letting you know of my progress as I make my way through the feature. As part of another personal project, I've already got to mess around with Dropbox API and this "list_folder#longpoll" method particularly, so I foresee I'll probably be much more occupied doing the integration into the `rclone` project, than experimenting with the API itself.

So, any extra, useful development/setup tip/advice you may consider worthwhile would be much appreciated :)
